## Overview
Visual prototype of the Relevant Radio mobile app home screen, built one component at a time in Claude Code (React with inline styles). Each task is a discrete, small-scope component that can be built in isolation and assembled into the full home screen.


## Recurring Patterns (Reference Only)
These patterns appear across multiple tasks. **Do NOT build these as standalone reusable components up front.** Build them inline as part of each individual task. If reuse opportunities emerge naturally, refactor later.

- **Horizontal Scroll Row** ‚Äî appears in Tasks 5, 8, 9, 10, 11, 12 (with different card shapes/overlays each time)
- **Full-Width Hero Card with Overlay Text** ‚Äî appears in Tasks 4, 6
- **Persistent Bar** ‚Äî appears in Tasks 2, 3, 7

### TASK 5 ‚Äî Featured Tiles Row
**Status:** ‚úÖ Complete
**Priority:** 4th
**Why:** Core navigation and discovery, prominent placement

**Requirements:**
- Section header: "Featured" in green bold text, left-aligned
- 3 square tiles in a horizontal scroll row
- Each tile:
  - Square image (show/content artwork)
  - Text label below the image (not overlaid)
  - Text truncated with ellipsis if too long
- Current examples:
  1. "Listen Live" (Patrick Madrid Show artwork)
  2. "Lent with the Sai..." (Lent with the Saints, Kiley Lawrence artwork)
  3. "Lenten Lessons..." (Lenten Lessons on the Mass, Fr. Rocky artwork)
- No "VIEW ALL" for this section (only 3 items shown)

**Screenshot reference:** Images 5, 6 (below banner)

### TASK 6 ‚Äî Hero Article Card (Full-Width Swipeable)
**Status:** ‚úÖ Complete
**Priority:** 6th
**Why:** Content showcase, different format from tiles

**Requirements:**
- Full-width image card (landscape orientation, tall ‚Äî roughly 60% of screen width in height)
- Title text overlaid in white at top-left of image
  - Example: "Lenten Lessons on the Mass 3: The Tabernacle"
- Dark gradient/scrim overlay behind text for readability
- Pagination dots at bottom-left (3 dots visible)
- "VIEW ALL" text link at bottom-right + small grid icon next to it
- Swipeable between multiple articles
- Links to text articles (tap behavior placeholder)

**Screenshot reference:** Images 5, 6 (large tabernacle image)

### TASK 8 ‚Äî Continue Listening Row
**Status:** ‚¨ú Not started
**Priority:** 5th

- Section header: "Continue Listening" in green bold text

- Each tile:
  - Square podcast/show artwork
  - Semi-transparent play button overlay centered on image
  - Progress bar at bottom of tile showing % of episode listened (thin colored bar)
  - Text label below: show name (truncated)
- Current examples: Patrick Madrid Show, Family Rosary Across America, Rosary Without Music, etc.

**Screenshot reference:** Image 4 (Continue Listening section), Image 5 (partially visible)

### TASK 12 ‚Äî Audio Prayers Row
**Status:** ‚¨ú Not started
**Priority:** 8th
**Why:** Unique to this app, strong brand differentiator

**Requirements:**
- Section header: "Audio Prayers"
- Horizontal scroll of square tiles (~12 items)
- Each tile:
  - Stylized colored background (blue, green, brown/gold variants)
  - Bold white text overlay on image (prayer name)
  - Rosary/cross graphic elements
  - "VIEW ALL" link at end
- Tapping a tile ‚Üí opens audio prayer player or text prayer (placeholder)
- Current examples:
  - "25 MIN ROSARY (ENGLISH)" ‚Äî blue background

  - "ROSARY WITHOUT MUSIC (ENGLISH)" ‚Äî brown/gold background
